list_definition.definition: (also light bulb) a pear-shaped glass globe surrounding the element of an electric light
the ball-shaped part of the stem of certain plants, eg onions, tulips etc, from which their roots grow

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Plant the bulbs in rows, about six inches apart

list_definition.definition: the pear-shaped end of a thermometer.
